changeSet.author: Mayne
changeSet.comment: 新建 automation robot 运行历史表
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `${table.prefix}automation_run_history` ( `id` bigint(20) UNSIGNED NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `task_id` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '自定义运行任务ID', `robot_id` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '机器人ID', `space_id` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '[冗余]当前任务机器人所属的空间站ID', `status` tinyint(2) unsigned DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '运行状态(0:运行中,1:成功,2:失败)', `data` json DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '运行上下文详细信息', `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `uk_task_id` (`task_id`) USING BTREE COMMENT '运行任务唯一编码', INDEX `idx_space_id` (`space_id`) COMMENT '空间站 ID' ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8mb4 COLLATE = utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT = '自动化-机器人-运行历史表';
